title: The Christmas dream
creator_credit: Czechoslovak Film Corporation, B Zeman and K Zeman
brief_description: A fantasy in which a little girl’s toys come to life in a dream - the toys being played by puppets. (The film is noteworthy for the excellence of the puppet animation in the original material - for American distribution introductory and concluding sequences have been added to the film by Castle Films, USA.). Music only - no language.
